head.title: Book a holiday apartment at the beach online | Interhome
head.description: Book a holiday house at the sea; whether looking for adventure or relaxation, the beach is the perfect destination for everyone looking for a change of pace.

links.label: Safe, enjoyable holidays - discover our holiday ideas

content.text:
Under a bright blue sky and warm sun, a holiday home at the sea is a great way to spend your next holiday. Whether you are booking a holiday for two or the whole family, interhome has holiday apartments for every taste and need. Stay on the coast of a romantic city, and enjoy quiet days and exciting nights on the town. You can also book your holiday house at the beach away from it all and enjoy the peaceful sounds of the waves crashing into the shore. In a holiday home at the beach you can plan your own schedule, or even have no schedule at all. For those looking for a little more adventure, a beach holiday has much to offer.

Destinations: Sardinia, Sicily, Tuscany Coast, Amalfi Coast and Adria; Istria, Dalmatia and Kvarn Bay; Côte d'Azur, Languedoc-Roussillon and Normandy, Costa Blanca, Costa Daurada and Costa Brava; and Balearics or the Canaries.

Check out our Last Minute offers: Last Minute Offers.

content.headline: Safety in your holiday home!
content.key: Safe hand-over of the key on-site

elements.title: Only selected and tested accommodation
elements.subtitle: Quality is our number one priority
elements.caption: Every property is checked before your arrival to ensure the best possible stay.

elements.title: Guaranteed availability and on-site service
elements.subtitle: Make the most of our experience
elements.caption: Key collection is arranged by our helpful staff.  Available 24/7 or on-site service to help you with all your questions, e.g.: tips and insights for your holiday destination and your booked accommodation.

elements.title: A memorable holiday experience
elements.subtitle: Privacy and freedom in your own holiday home
elements.caption: Be your own boss, eat whenever you want and make the most of plenty of space for all your friends and family.

elements.title: Why Interhome
elements.caption: It has never been easier to find your perfect holiday. Do you want to explore new travel destinations? There is no better way than doing it in a holiday home: Enjoy "la dolce vita" in Italy, feel the charming lifestyle of the French Riviera or the Spanish way of life. Be inspired by our travel ideas and book online - quick, easy, and secure with Interhome.

elements.title: Freedom, privacy and space in your holiday home
elements.caption: Your stay in a holiday house or a holiday apartment offers plenty of advantages: spend your time exactly as you want. No disturbance from other guests or hotel staff, just spend your holiday according to your own rules. Whether you are looking for a city trip, a relaxing holiday with your family or with friends. Simply enjoy lots of room, flexibility and freedom in your holiday home.
